SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AggressiveStepListener
An aggressive step listener for hostile/aggressive Mobs.
BridgeCollisionException
The BridgeCollisionException class is used to handle exceptions related to bridge collisions.
BridgeIllegalHeightException
It checks if the height of the bridge is valid and throws an exception if it is not.
BridgeNullPointException
Ensures neither of the bridge points are null or destroyed.
BridgeUnacceptableRangeException
This class is used to check if the distance between two points is within an acceptable range.
Commands
Enum representing various commands in the Console.
Console
Console class for handling console output and logging.
Controls
Controls class handles the main keyboard and mouse inputs for the game.
Direction
Enum representing the four cardinal directions.
DropTable
DropTable class manages the drop chances and sizes of items in the game.
Environments
Enum representing the different environments in the game.
Game
The main class for the game.

As the entry point, it sets up the game world, view, and handles game state management.
GameBodyImage
GameBodyImage class extends BodyImage to create a custom class It calculates the width based on the aspect ratio of the image file.
GameFrame
Extends JFrame and represents the main window for the game.
It provides constructors to initialise the frame with different types of views and sets up the frame with common properties.
GameJMenuBar
The GameJMenuBar class extends JMenuBar to create a custom menu bar for the game.
GameSound
A class that extending SoundClip and is used to handle the game sounds.
GameTime
The GameTime class manages the game's time using a javax.swing.Timer.
GameView
Extends UserView and provides custom rendering for the game.
GameWorld
Extends World and represents the game world.
GothicCemetery
* The GothicCemetery Environment class.
GothicFlatDefault
A flat platform using the img GothicFlatDefault.IMG from the GothicvaniaCemetery.
GothicFlatSkull
A flat platform using the image GothicFlatSkull.IMG with skulls on it.
GothicPillar
A child of GroundFrame, this class is used to create a pillar in the gothic cemetery.
GothicProp
A class extending Prop, representing various props in the Gothic Cemetery.
GothicSlope
An abstract class used to make slopes which act as a slope for a player to go up and down.
GothicSlopeDefault
A platform that takes user params and uses its own default image to create a slope.
GothicSlopeSkull
A GothicSlope using the skull image.
GothicSpikes
Gothic Spikes This class represents a groundFrame object in the game world that deals damage to players and mobs that come into contact with it.
GroundFrame
An abstract class used for all ground objects in the game.
HauntedBackdrop
A class representing a haunted backdrop in the game.
HauntedFlatPlatform
A platform which uses the HauntedForest tile set.
HauntedForest
* The HauntedForest Environment class.
HauntedPillar
HauntedPillar class represents a pillar in the haunted forest level.
HauntedPool
HauntedPool class represents a haunted pool in the game.
HauntedProp
Represents a haunted prop in the game world.
HauntedSlopePlatform
Represents a slope platform in the haunted forest level of the game.
HealthPotion
HealthVial class is a subclass of the ItemBody class.
HuntressWalker
Deprecated.
IllegalLengthScaleException
Throws when the length scale is less than 1.
InvalidBridgeException
The parent class for all bridge-related exceptions.
Inventory
Inventory class that stores items in a list.
InventoryButton
The InventoryButton class represents a button in the game's inventory UI.
InventoryItem
InventoryItem class represents an item in the inventory.
ItemBehaviour
Enum representing different item behaviours in the game.
ItemDropEntry
Represents an entry in the item drop table, containing the item type and its size drop entries.
ItemFrame
Abstract class for all item bodies in the game.
ItemSize
Enum representing different item sizes in the game.
ItemType
Enum representing different item types in the game.
JLabelTitle
The JLabelTitle class extends JLabel to create a custom title label for the game menu.
JMenuPanel
The JMenuPanel class extends JPanel to create a custom menu panel for the game.
It includes buttons for Continue and Quit, sliders for game music and sound, and a background image.
LevelData
This class Handles the saving, storing, deleting and loading of level data.
LevelFrame
An abstract class that serves as a base for all levels in the game.
LogTypes
Enum representing the different labels for the Console.
MagicBridge
Level bridge between two GroundFrame instances.
MagicCliff
The MagicCliff Environment class.
MagicCliffDark
MagicCliffDark class represents a dark magic cliff in the game.
MagicCliffLight
MagicCliffDark class represents a dark magic cliff in the game.
MagicFloatingPlatform
Platform object which extends GroundFrame.
MagicFloatingRockMedium
MagicCliffDark class represents a dark magic cliff in the game.
MagicFloatingRockSmall
MagicCliffDark class represents a dark magic cliff in the game.
MagicPlatform
The MagicPlatform class represents a platform in the game world.
MagicPlatformCliff
An abstract class representing a cliff in the game world.
MagicProp
MagicProp class represents a prop in the game world.
MainMenu
The MainMenu class represents the main menu of the game, providing options.
MobAnimationStepListener
The MobAnimationStepListener class manages the animation steps for a MobWalker.
MobStepListener
An abstract class serving as an internal facing API.
MobStepListenerFrame
Interface for the StepListener, used to implement WalkerBehaviour
MobStore
* The MobStore class is used to store the number of mobs
MobWalker
The core abstract class for all mobs in the game.
Options
The Options class provides a user interface for game options, including volume controls and reset progress functionality.
PassiveStepListener
A passive step listener for non-hostile/passive Mobs.
PassthroughListener
This class is used to make a walker pass through another walker.
PlatformType
Enum Representing the different types of platforms for MagicCliffs.
PlayerStepListener
The PlayerStepListener class implements StepListener to manage the animation and state transitions for the PlayerWalker.
PlayerWalker
The core class for the player.
PolygonEditor
Very basic polygon editor.
Projectile
The Projectile class represents a projectile in the game.
Prop
Prop class serves as a parent class for all props in the game.
SelectLevel
The SelectLevel class provides a user interface for selecting game levels.
SoundFX
The SoundFX class implements the SoundInterface and provides sound effects for various game actions.
SoundGroups
An enum which represents the different sound groups.
SoundInterface
The SoundInterface defines the methods for various sound actions in the game.
State
The different states of walkers in the game.
StatusGetter
Handles the fetching of data from files.
StrengthPotion
StrengthPotion class represents a potion that increases the player's strength.
TempGround
Deprecated.
replaced by more robust ground classes.
ToMenuButton
Takes the player back to the main menu after winning or losing the game.
Trampoline
Deprecated.
replaced by HauntedPillar's HauntedElevator, which allows fast vertical travel.
WalkerAnimationFrames
The WalkerAnimationFrames class extends the abstract class AnimationFrames to manage animation frames for different types of walkers.
WalkerBehaviour
Enum representing the types of walker behaviours
WalkerFrame
An Abstract class used for all walkers in the game.
WalkerType
Enums representing the different walker types in the game.
WizardWalker
A Wizard mob that extends MobWalker, and is used to represent a wizard in the game.
WormWalker
A Worm mob that extends MobWalker, and is used to represent a worm in the game.
